name: My Life Sucks, I was a duck. No work, just Quack all day and sometimes eat bread
name_original: My Life Sucks, I was a duck. No work, just Quack all day and sometimes eat bread
description:
Controls

P1 - Arrow Keys

P2 - WASD Keys

P3 - NUMPAD 8,4,5,6 Keys

P4- V,B,N, Spacebar

Life bringing you down? too many bills? a test you did not study for?

Don't you wish you could shed your mortal coil and live a simpler life?

Presenting Duck Simulator or: My life sucks, I wish I was a duck, no work.

just Quack-Quack and eat bread. Enjoy all the benefits of being a duck in

a simulation like no other.

You can have experiences such as:

 

-               Swimming. Experience the blissful feel off gliding over the top of the nice waters, surrounded by the lovely country.

 

-              Quacking. Using state of the art software we are fully capable of giving you the experience of quacking just because you feel like it. 

are you saying rude things? nice things? who knows, you are a duck!

 

-             Eating breadcrumbs. Some nice elderly people are very kind that they will feed you if you ask nicely to them. Do not like breadcrumbs? Well you can just do not, after all it is your simulation after all!

 

Invite your friends for the greatest Co-op experience of pretending to be a bird.

in a very secluded pond.

 

Credits

Developers:

Concept & Editor - FeyGrimm

Programmer & Graphics Artist - Ferrz

Software Used:

PaintDotNet  - Graphics

Unity2D - Game Engine

VisualStudio - Coding

BFXR - Sounds
